Name: Nazarick
History: Nazarick is a fictional civilization. They are known as shadow roamers of the world

Technologies.Name: Thingstead
Technologies.History: The thing was the assembly of the free men. At the thing, disputes were resolved and political decisions were made.

Heroes.Name: Razor the Lightning
Heroes.History: With Razor, the Nazarick get the edge.

CivBonuses.Name: Grand Magus of Nazarick
CivBonuses.History: Nazarick learned of Celtic structures, which were mostly made of wood with rubble foundations.
CivBonuses.Description: Nazarick buildings have 20% less health, but are also 20% cheaper and faster to construct.

CivBonuses.Name: Emperor of Emperors
CivBonuses.Description: The Nazarick troops produce a surprisingly large number soldiers. Their capabilities remain a secret to the rest of the world.
